acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 41494.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Bedford County was formed in 1753 from Lunenburg County. Part of Albemarle was added in 1754 and part of Lunenburg was added later.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Bedford County (Va.) Various Court Records, ca. 1772-ca. 1800. Consists of two judgments, Burton v. Haynes, ca. 1797; and Evans v. Frederick, ca. 1799; the estate account of Richard Dearen, 1772; and a petition and report, 1800, pertaining to a proposed road from Davies' Ferry Road at the upper end of Philip Burton's plantation to the county line.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Bedford County Court Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. See www.lva.lib.va.us/whatwehave/local/local_rec/index.htm
